attributes.action: Oven chips to have accurate cooking times on their packaging.
attributes.background: Currently following the timing given on most packets of frozen oven chips leads to soggy disappointment at best. Chips should be cooked through and crisp at the end of the allocated cooking period. The current situation makes it difficult to judge cooking the other components of a balanced meal.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. This is the responsibility of individual oven chip manufacturers.
